SEARCH
Package youtube

Class Simulation

java.lang.Object
youtube.Simulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Simulation extends Object implements Serializable
The Simulation class represents a YouTube-like simulation with users, channels, videos, and streams. It includes multithreading to simulate user and channel activities. This class is also serializable for saving and loading the simulation state.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Simulation()
    Constructs a new Simulation object, initializes user, channel, video, stream lists and starts the simulation threads ( User and Channel have thair own tasks to do).

    • Simulation

      public Simulation()
      Constructs a new Simulation object, initializes user, channel, video, stream lists and starts the simulation threads ( User and Channel have thair own tasks to do).

  • Method Details

    • randomDate

      public LocalDate randomDate()
      Returns a random date, which is used durring initialization
      Returns:
      a LocalDate which is random

    • stopThreads

      public void stopThreads()
      Stops all simulation threads by setting the stopThreads flag and interrupting each thread. Waits for all threads to finish.

    • restartThreads

      public void restartThreads()
      Restarts simulation threads after stopping. Creates new threads and starts them.

    • saveSimulation

      public void saveSimulation(String filePath)
      Saves the current state of the simulation to a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file where the simulation state will be saved.

    • loadSimulation

      public void loadSimulation(String filePath) throws ClassNotFoundException
      Loads a saved simulation state from a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file containing the saved simulation state.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - If the class of the serialized object cannot be found.
